title: An Act relative to prohibit  sex offenders from entering on to public or private school property for any reason

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Garry of Dracut, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Colleen M. Garry relative to prohibiting sex offenders from entering public or private school property for any reason.  The Judiciary.
